Services.title: WHAT SERVICES DO WE OFFER?
Services.description1: At World Wide Travel, we offer comfortable and safe trips from Chișinău to your favorite destinations in Europe. Our modern minibuses and buses are equipped to ensure you have a relaxing journey. Our experienced drivers will get you to your destination safely and on time.
Services.description2: With our parcel delivery service, you can send packages quickly and safely from Chișinău to cities in Austria, Germany, France, and Switzerland. We ensure prompt delivery and treat each parcel with care and attention.
Services.parcelInfoText1: For larger parcels, the rate is calculated per unit. Please contact our office or visit us in person to determine the rate.
Services.parcelInfoText2: Collection and delivery of parcels are carried out throughout the territory of the Republic of Moldova and Switzerland. Depending on the needs, transportation can be done in refrigerated chambers.
Services.first-name-last-name-req-err-desc: Please enter your full name to continue.
Services.phone-req-desc: Please enter a valid phone number to continue.
Services.to-city-req-desc: Please enter the destination city to continue.
Services.to-city-err-desc: Please select a city from the list to continue.

Features.title: WHY OUR TEAM?
Features.featuresBoldText: At World Wide Travel, we are dedicated to providing you with high-quality passenger and parcel transportation services, with regular departures from Chișinău.
Features.featuresCheckText_1_Description: We ensure that every trip is safe and comfortable for you.
Features.featuresCheckText_2_Description: Our drivers are experienced and dedicated to providing you with the best service.
Features.featuresCheckText_3_Description: We offer high-quality services at competitive prices.

Footer.footerInfo: For more information about our services or to make a reservation, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Footer.copyright: Copyright © World Wide Travel all rights reserved.

AboutHeader.headerDesc: Every journey is a unique experience, filled with comfort and safety, with destinations in Switzerland, Austria, Germany and France.

AboutPage_About.title: WHO ARE WE?
AboutPage_About.AboutBoldText: We are World Wide Travel, an international passenger and parcel transport company based in Chișinău.
AboutPage_About.AboutParagraph_1: With over 10 years of experience, we are dedicated to providing high-quality services, ensuring safe and comfortable journeys for all our passengers.
AboutPage_About.AboutParagraph_2: We take pride in our modern fleet of buses and our professional team that ensures you reach your destination in the best conditions. We specifically cater to elderly individuals, offering them all the support they need for a worry-free journey.

AboutFeatures.title: WHY OUR TEAM?
AboutFeatures.featureCard_1_Description: We ensure that every trip is safe and comfortable for you.
AboutFeatures.featureCard_2_Description: Our drivers are experienced and dedicated to providing you with the best service.
AboutFeatures.featureCard_3_Description: We offer high-quality services at competitive prices.
AboutFeatures.featureCard_4_Description: We adhere to departure and arrival times, ensuring you arrive on time.
AboutFeatures.featureCard_5_Description: We continually invest in improving service quality.
AboutFeatures.featureCard_6_Description: We provide all the necessary information for a trip with no surprises.

AboutPage_Testimonials.title: WHAT DO CLIENTS SAY?
AboutPage_Testimonials.test_1_text: I have traveled several times with World Wide Travel and I am always impressed by the comfort and safety provided. I highly recommend it!
AboutPage_Testimonials.test_2_text: I have had the opportunity to travel a few times with World Wide Travel and I can say that their services are impeccable.
AboutPage_Testimonials.test_3_text: The buses are modern and clean, and the trips are very pleasant. Thank you for the excellent services!
AboutPage_Testimonials.test_4_text: Everything was perfect from booking to arrival. A team of true professionals, I highly recommend!

Contacts_FAQ.title: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
Contacts_FAQ.question1: What is the departure point and which cities are included in your route?
Contacts_FAQ.answer1: The departure point for all our routes is Chișinău, located at Tighina 2/2. The main route is Chișinău-Switzerland, with stops in major cities in Austria, France, and Germany. Depending on client availability and preferences, we also offer the possibility to drop you off in certain locations along the route. We recommend contacting us for additional details about schedules and intermediate stop points.
Contacts_FAQ.question2: How can I book a seat for a trip or a parcel delivery service?
Contacts_FAQ.answer2: You can book a seat for a trip or schedule a parcel delivery service either by phone or by visiting our website. On the site, you need to fill out a simple booking form with the details of your trip or shipment. After completing the form, you will receive confirmation via email or phone, and payment is made at the time of departure or parcel delivery, exclusively in cash.
Contacts_FAQ.question3: What amenities do you offer during the trip?
Contacts_FAQ.answer3: During the trip, we ensure that all passengers travel in comfort and safety. We offer comfortable seats, luggage space, air conditioning, and Wi-Fi access where available. We also make regular stops at selected places for rest and meals. For long-distance trips, we recommend asking in advance about any additional amenities or special requirements we may fulfill.
Contacts_FAQ.question4: How are parcel delivery prices calculated?
Contacts_FAQ.answer4: The price for parcel delivery is calculated based on the total weight of the parcel. An additional charge is applied for each extra kilogram, according to the price list displayed on the website in the 'Services' section. Please consult this section for specific details or contact us for personalized information regarding special or large shipments.
Contacts_FAQ.question5: What personal data do you collect and how is it protected?
Contacts_FAQ.answer5: When you create an account on our website, we only collect the necessary information to provide you with optimal transport and shipping services (such as your name, email address, and phone number). We ensure the security of your data through advanced technical and administrative measures, in accordance with national and European legislation. Personal data is not used for purposes other than processing your bookings and orders, and it will never be sold or shared with third parties.
Contacts_FAQ.question6: What should I know before sending an international parcel?
Contacts_FAQ.answer6: When sending an international parcel through our service, it is important to ensure that you comply with the customs regulations of the transit and destination countries. Some products may be restricted or prohibited from shipping, such as certain foods, liquids, or hazardous items. Also, make sure that the packaging is sturdy and suitable for long-distance transport. If you have special requirements or valuable shipments, please contact us in advance to discuss further details.
Contacts_FAQ.question7: What happens if I miss my reservation or cannot arrive on time?
Contacts_FAQ.answer7: If you cannot arrive at the scheduled departure time, please notify us as soon as possible. Depending on availability, we will try to reschedule you for a later trip at no additional cost. However, if you fail to notify us in time about the cancellation or rescheduling, you may lose the reservation.
